article: the american presidential campaign season was abruptly numbed by tragedy tuesday as missouri mourned the death in a plane crash of its democratic governor , mel carnahan , who was in a tight race for a u.s. senate seat with the republican incumbent , john ashcroft .
abstract: death of missouri governor carnahan bodes ill for democrats
